title: Chogattai Majutsu Robot Ginguiser
synopsis: Twenty thousand years before the creation of mankind, two tribes-Plazmans and Sazorions-came to the earth. The bellicose Sazorions tried to conquer the peaceful Plazmans using the dreadful power of the Scorpio in outer space.
staff: [['Annou, Masami', ['Director']], ['Sasaki, Isao', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Yokoyama, Seiji', ['Music']], ['Yamauchi, Shigeyasu', ['Production Manager', ' Production Assistant']]]
